author: Staff Correspondent
text:
Anand Sharma said he would seek special category status for Himachal Pradesh.

Deputy Leader of the Congress in the Rajya Sabha Anand Sharma has been elected unopposed to the Upper House from Himachal Pradesh, his home State.

The Opposition BJP, with just 27 members in the 68-seat House, chose not to field a candidate against him.

Mr. Sharma said he would raise the issue of special category status to Himachal Pradesh and persuade the Centre to release the grants withheld.
title: Anand Sharma elected to RS
